name: Cubed (5 Cupcakes)
description: This game is a normal platforming game, with a twist. You have the ability to shrink and grow your character. Through 9 levels, you will explore new platforms. Everything culminates in a final 10th level. This game was created using Processing 3. The level design was done by Noah Rinke and Matthew Epstein. Code was also done by Noah Rinke. This game was made for Mottzy's Jammy Jam game jam over the course of 20 days.
